name: eqvrelcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c1)), wrel(c1), wbr(c0, c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wrel(c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(wa(wrel(c1), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wrel(c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(wa(wrel(c1), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wrel(c1))
-| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))
-| wi(weqvrel(c1), wrel(c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(wa(wrel(c1), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))
-| wi(weqvrel(c1), wrel(c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ dom(c1))
⊣ (w0 → c0[c1]c2)
⊣ ((Rel(c1)∧ c0[c1]c2)→ c0 ∈ dom(c1))
⊣ (w0 → EqvRel(c1))
⊣ (EqvRel(c1)→ Rel(c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(wa(wrel(c1), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wrel(c1), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, weqvrel(c1))

comment: Elementhood in the field of an equivalence relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Peter Mazsa, 2-Jun-2019.)
